title: About
text: This Comic Book is a scientific outreach product designed by the Editors during the TUM Researcher Program. TUM Researcher is a 12-month qualification programme that prepares researchers for a responsible leadership role in research.

title: About
text:
Funding
The Comic Book was funded by The Daylight Academy, eConversion, and crc325.

title: About
text:
Contributing
You can contribute by translating this comic book to your native language. If you are interested, get in touch with Dr. Anna Biller: anna.biller@tum.de

text:
You can contribute by translating this comic book to your native language.
If you are interested, get in touch with Dr. Anna Biller: anna.biller@tum.de

title: Lumi’s Delight
text:
This website hosts the comic book Lumi’s Delight and its various translations. The book is intended for young readers aged 6-10 years old but older readers hopefully enjoy the content, too!
Written and illustrated by Coline Weinz.
Edited by Dr Anna M Biller, Dr. Alejandra Parreño, Dr. Simone Stegbauer, Dr. Verena Streibel, and Dr. Matthew The.







How to cite this resource:



Weinz, C., Biller (Ed.), A. M., Parreño, A. (Ed.), Stegbauer, S. (Ed.), Streibel, V. (Ed.) & The, M. (Ed.) (2025). Lumi’s Delight (C. Weinz, Illus.). DOI: TBA.
